thread.title: Sun Smiles if You Can Pay the Up-Front Cost

author: wsjcom
title: Sun Smiles if You Can Pay the Up-Front Cost
text:
California’s decision to cut energy use by ensuring that new homes have access to solar power is a win for California homebuyers (“California Solar Vote Is Set to Jolt Home Costs,” page one, May 10). The new standard will actually save homeowners considerable cash—$14,400 over the life of a 30-year mortgage.
Savvy appraisers know that the present value of an average solar system now adds more value to the home than the cost of the system. These homes will be more comfortable, have better indoor air quality, emit fewer greenhouse-gas...
